Package me.ihdeveloper.api.sign_editor.reflection

Interface SignReflection

public interface SignReflection
Represents a reflection helper to support multiple versions of NMS

  • Method Details

    • readLines

      String[] readLines​(Object packet)
      Reads an input packet of sign being updated
      Parameters:
      packet - The input packet of the sign being updated
      Returns:
      The lines stored in the input packet

    • openSignEditor

      Object openSignEditor​(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Generates the sign editor packet
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the sign for the player's world or the game world
      Returns:
      The output packet that includes the required information to open the sign editor

    • updateSignToPlayer

      void updateSignToPlayer​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.Location location, String[] lines)
      Update sign lines to the player
      Parameters:
      player - The player that you aim to update the sign for
      location - The location of the sign in the player's world
      lines - The new values of the lines of the sign

    • sendSignChangeToPlayer

      void sendSignChangeToPlayer​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.Location location, byte data)
      Send a block change that sets a certain block to be a sign. Legacy and latest versions of Bukkit API includes different type of sign Material
      Parameters:
      player - The player to send the block change to
      location - The location of the block
      data - Raw data in bytes about the block

    • sendPacketToPlayer

      void sendPacketToPlayer​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, Object packet)
      Sends a packet to the player using NMS
      Parameters:
      player - The player that you are going to send the packet to
      packet - The object of the output packet
